# Preamble

Set working directory and load libraries.

```{r}
setwd("~/Projects/TeoSocialMediaVeterans/scripts")
library(tools)
library(MASS)
library(readxl)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(svglite)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(multcomp)
```

Reproducibility steps.

```{r}
sessionInfo() %>% print(locale = FALSE)
set.seed(as.integer(as.Date("2017-05-22")))
```
